item.title: Ramaco Resources Inc S-1
item.description: Ramaco Resources Inc, which is in the Bituminous Coal & Lignite Mining [1220] industry, SEC S-1 filing on June 17, 2021 had 16616 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: notes - 484 instances may - 183 instances 10 - 159 instances u - 147 instances company - 125 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
